nodes.text: Kat Saka was a human female farmer from the Outer Rim planet Batuu known for collecting spices throughout the galaxy, which were used in the Outpost Mix, a colorful, grain-based snack food available at Kat Saka's Kettle in Black Spire Outpost. Her family ran the Saka Homestead, which raised banthas and grew Surabat grain.
